title: 30 Monedas
overview: Father Vergara is an exorcist, boxer and ex-convict who is exiled by the church to be the priest of a remote town in Spain. He wants to forget and be forgotten, but his enemies will soon find him. Strange things begin to happen, and an unlikely task force of Mayor Paco and local vet Elena seek the truth, whilst reality is distorted by a cursed coin which is at the heart of a global conspiracy.
